General.Name: Lion Travel Service Co Ltd
General.Description: Lion Travel Service Co., Ltd. provides travel services in Taiwan and internationally. It offers packaged tour, transportation ticketing, visa application, tour guide, and other travel-related services. The company also engages in the information technology, management consulting, catering, and tour bus transportation activities. In addition, it publishes magazine; and acts as a property insurance broker. The company was incorporated in 1977 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
